tasks.title: Mac Mini Headless Setup

tasks.title: AI Management Studio

tasks.title: Tool Optimization

tasks.title: Connect Enterprise Claude Cowork
tasks.description: Bridge Work Claude (has email/calendar access) with Claudia (can take actions). Apple Notes relay: Work Claude writes to Claudia/Inbox, I poll and execute actions (reminders, notifications). Zero tokens when idle.

tasks.title: MedTech Warehouse Database
